data.title: Amherst Magazine Index
data.text:
Volumes 1-56, 1949-2004

Index entries are followed by page citations in one of the following formats:

volume number (in roman numerals): page number

volume number (in roman numerals): issue number-page number

date of issue, page number

Please note: This index was compiled by multiple people at various times and later converted to digital format using text recognition software, please assume typographical and conversion errors.
